items.strItemDescription: Ooooh! Aaaaah! So pretty! It's always a celebration when you're around but you WILL be able to be seen before you're close! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.
A cloak created from a beautiful red maple leaf!
Show your wilderness side with this furry cap! Happy Canada Day!
Show your wilderness side with this furry cap! Happy Canada Day!
Show your wilderness side with this furry cap! Happy 4th of July!
Show your wilderness side with this furry cap! Happy 4th of July!

Soar high on your Liberty Wings!
Independence is more delicious when it comes in syrup form.
Brrrrawwwck! Freedom for all!
